// Action Bar Strings New Edit Remove FAQ About Write Review
Since the Affordable Care Act, a race has been under way to develop a dominant electronic medical record. Most agree that a single system would help healthcare providers to harmoniously communicate and deliver optimal healthcare. However, because enormous incentives have been offered for hospitals to adopt electronic medical records, many have made the leap using a variety of competing systems. Smaller systems seem to be evaporating and only a few will likely survive. The race is on. We inventors of Mini Med Record have no interest in competing in this arena. Instead we offer a record aimed purely at helping patients to communicate the information they consider most important. While billing and medicolegal protection are major focus areas for larger systems, we are only interested in empowering patients and improving their care. Your Mini Med Record is yours and yours alone. We hope our service will help to improve your experience any time you venture into the rapidly shifting and sometimes frightening world of healthcare.
